FAULT.description: The log entry indicates a malfunction of the encoder, e.g. position fault

WARNING.description: The log entry is a warning, e.g. for battery status

UNSPECIFIED.description: No information about the type of the event is given.  The intended purpose for the definition is usage by the GetFilteredLogbookEntries Method to specify “don’t care” for the EventType parameter. Must not be used for log entries and encoder diagnosis events as EncoderDiagnosisEventType and LogbookEventType

ALL_DISAPPEARS.description: No diagnosis condition of any severity is persisting

APPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated arises and/or persists

DISAPPEARS.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. No diagnosis condition of the same severity is persisting for the affected channel

DISAPPEARS_OTHER_REMAIN.description: The diagnosis condition indicated does not longer persist. Other diagnosis conditions of the same severity are persisting

FAULT.description: The log entry indicates a malfunction of the encoder, e.g. position fault

WARNING.description: The log entry is a warning, e.g. for battery status

UNSPECIFIED.description: No information about the type of the event is given.  The intended purpose for the definition is usage by the GetFilteredLogbookEntries Method to specify “don’t care” for the EventType parameter. Must not be used for log entries and encoder diagnosis events as EncoderDiagnosisEventType and LogbookEventType

FaultSituationNumber.description: Identification of fault situation. 0 means current fault situation

EventNumber.description: Unique number of log entry, analogous to Fault message counter

EventType.title: EventTypeEnumeration
EventType.description: Characterization of the event (fault, warning, etc.). Must never have the value “UNSPECIFIED”

EventCode.description: Fault-code identifying a fault or warning

EventText.description: Brief description of the fault or warning

EventAcknowledged.description: Time when the event is acknowledged

INCREASING_CLOCKWISE.description: Increasing position values with clockwise rotation (viewed from shaft side)

INCREASING_COUNTERCLOCKWISE.description: Increasing position values with counterclockwise rotation (viewed from shaft side)

Value.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.
Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

NORMAL_OPERATION.description: The position feedback interface operates normally

REFERENCE_VALUE_Gx_XIST2.description: The reference value is loaded in Gx_XIST2

SET_SHIFT_HOME_POSITION.description: Gx_XIST1 and Gx_XIST2 are set or shifted by a predefined preset value

WAIT_FOR_MEASURED_VALUE.description: Measurement task active, waiting for measurement values

MEASURED_VALUE_IN_XIST2.description: The requested measured value is loaded into Gx_XIST2

PARKING.description: The position feedback interface is inactive and does not deliver a valid Gx_XIST1 value

PARKING_ERROR.description: There is an error present and Gx_XIST1 is signaled invalid

PARKING_ERROR_ACK.description: Error acknowledgement is being processed and Gx_XIST1 is signaled invalid

ENABLE_PRESET_CONTROL.description: G1_XIST1 is affected by a Set-/Shift home position function command

DISABLE_PRESET_CONTROL.description: Set-/Shift home position function does not affect G1_XIST1

Value.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.
